data.author: Brad Paugh

changelog.release_notes: Fixed some minor bugs with configuration error handling. Added support for Pebble Time 2.
Fixed issue with scrolling text and being unable to complete items on certain systems.
Fixed problems with "accented" characters. Made today list order based on date.
Fixed a bug where today list was not displaying the correct items.
Added support for item decompletion
Moved the add new button to the top instead of the bottom.
Completely re-wrote the app to use the latest todoist API v7 as the old API has been deprecated.
Fixed a bug where IPhone users could not load the app
Fixed issue with timeline when you had items in your list added from outlook.
Added the ability to enable and disable writing to the timeline from the config screen. Fixed a few minor bugs.
Fixed an issue with timeline
Fixed issue where "add new" button was not showing up on pebble time round
Fixed a bug causing an error when an item was over a year in the future.
Added support for Pebble Time Round!
Broke timeline in last update, should be fixed now.
Fix for timeline error 400

Added timeline support for aplite. Added ability to add new items to your projects by using your voice. Fixed a major memory leak. Fixed issue where items would not remove from the timeline when they were marked as completed in the app.

- Added Timeline Support, app will now add items with due dates to the timeline. App will update the timeline every time you run it. (Basalt only)

- Fixed an issue where leading zeros were not showing up on the minutes of due dates.

- Made some updates to the error window
Added support for the "ev" keyword for recurring tasks.

Big update!

- Completely redesigned graphical interface, if you used custom colors you may want to make some changes, as what looked good before may not look so good now. (Basalt only)
- Items now show due dates
- Projects and items will now show their indentation
- Recurring tasks will now complete properly (moves it to the next date)

There have been a lot of changes so if you find any bugs please let me know by pressing the "Email the Developer for Support" button.

data.description:
Unofficial Todoist app for Pebble Time. 

Todoist is a cloud based task management and todo list tool available on a wide variety of platforms. Works great for everything from simple shopping lists to project management. If you've just been looking for a basic todo list app on the pebble to keep yourself organized, todoist should work great! 

If you are not an existing user just sign up for an account at http://www.todoist.com. After that you'll be able to easily add/remove items and projects from your phone or PC and view them on your watch!

Features:
- Log in to your account via google or standard Todoist login.

- Scrolling Text for items that overflow the width of the screen, the scroll speed is customizable via the config screen.

- Completely customizable colors! Create your own style of interface using any of Pebble's 64 supported colors.

- View and complete items from any of your Todoist projects.

- Supports indentation, due dates, and completion of recurring tasks.

- Pins all items with due dates from your Todoist account to the timeline.

- Add new items to your projects using the microphone on devices that support it.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed some minor bugs with configuration error handling. Added support for Pebble Time 2.

data.title: Todoist Mini
